name: maven-central-proxy
content:
import org.sonatype.nexus.blobstore.api.BlobStoreManager
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.storage.WritePolicy
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.LayoutPolicy
import org.sonatype.nexus.repository.maven.VersionPolicy
def name='maven-central-proxy'
if(!repository.getRepositoryManager().exists(name)) { repository.createMavenProxy(name, "https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/", BlobStoreManager.DEFAULT_BLOBSTORE_NAME, false, VersionPolicy.RELEASE, LayoutPolicy.PERMISSIVE) }
